attachmentVideoUnit.notReleasedTooltip: Attachment only visible to teaching assistants and instructors. Release date:
attachmentVideoUnit.transcriptionInvalidJson: The transcription JSON is invalid and was ignored.

informativeText.firstLine: Artemis searches for the Outline (slide with title 'Outline' and bullet points with content headings) to split the PDF into content.
informativeText.secondLine: Artemis expects a repetition of the Outline slide at the start of every content section.
informativeText.note: Note: You will have the option to edit the information before finally submitting the content.

createAttachmentVideoUnits.noFile: There is no file for automatic processing. Please go back and try again.
createAttachmentVideoUnits.noUnitDetected: No content was detected and could not split automatically. Please add information for each content section!
createAttachmentVideoUnits.lectureFileToolTip: Please select to enable automatic separation of lecture content.

removeSlidesInfo.firstLine: All slides that contain any of the following key phrases will be removed from all content.
removeSlidesInfo.secondLine: Multiple key phrases are comma-separated, key phrases are not case-sensitive.
removeSlidesInfo.thirdLine: The following slides will be removed:

createAttachmentVideoUnits.timeout: Timed out during automatic content processing. Please try again.

validation.invalidPages: The start page or end page of {{ unitName }} are set incorrectly.

empty.unitName: Content name can not be empty.
empty.startPage: Start page can not be empty.
empty.endPage: End page can not be empty.

validation.endPageLower: End page can not be smaller than 1.
validation.startPageBigger: Start page can not be bigger than {{ max }}.
validation.startPage: Start page must be bigger or equal to 1.
validation.endPage: End page must be less or equal to {{ max }}.

createAttachmentVideoUnits.processTimeInfo: The processing of lecture content can take a few seconds. Please be patient.

createAttachmentVideoUnit.title: Create File/Video Content
createAttachmentVideoUnit.name: Name
createAttachmentVideoUnit.updateNotificationTextPlaceholder: Optional notification text for students about changes.
createAttachmentVideoUnit.updateNotificationTextMaxLengthValidatio: The notification text can be max 1000 characters long.
createAttachmentVideoUnit.nameMaxLengthValidationError: Name can be max 255 characters long.
createAttachmentVideoUnit.descriptionMaxLengthValidationError: Description can be max 1000 characters long.
createAttachmentVideoUnit.fileRequiredValidationError: You must select a file to upload.
createAttachmentVideoUnit.fileTooBig: File is too big! The maximum file size is 20 MB.
createAttachmentVideoUnit.sourcePlaceHolder: Enter an URL to an embeddable video
createAttachmentVideoUnit.urlHelperPlaceholder: You can enter a Video URL here and use the arrow to create the correct embeddable URL from it
createAttachmentVideoUnit.urlHelperValidationError: Automatic embed link generation is not possible for this URL
createAttachmentVideoUnit.videoTranscriptionPlaceholder: Insert the transcription of the video here.

delete.question: Do you really want to delete this content {{ title }}? The attachment will also be removed! You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the content for confirmation.

transcription.pendingWarning: A transcription is currently being processed for this video. Please wait for it to complete before generating a new one
transcription.overwriteWarning: Generating a new transcript will overwrite the existing transcription for this video.
transcription.statusProcessing: Please check the status of the transcription later
transcription.statusFailed: Transcription generation failed for this video. You can try generating it again.
transcription.editStatusProcessing: A transcription is currently being generated for this video.
transcription.editStatusFailed: The previous transcription generation failed for this video.
transcription.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the ongoing transcription?
